comments:
Build 20011107.

I had placed a breakpoint at the beginning of a method (self-hosting
workspace, breakpoint at top of SetClasspathOperation#updateProjectReferences
(...)). Then in a target workspace, perform a real change of the .classpath 
(reorder the classpath entries).

Got the following stack dump, and debugger hanged.

The JDI crash only occurred when running on J9 (latest official drop).

I never directly fixed this problem but we had many problems near this area 
that have been fixed.  My intention is to closed this bug as I can no longer 
reproduce it.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 6393 ***
